dashboard.label: Network Anomalies
dashboard.description: Detecção e visualização de anomalias na rede e comunicações suspeitas

map.search: index=network sourcetype=firewall OR sourcetype=proxy OR sourcetype=netflow | iplocation dest_ip | stats sum(bytes) as traffic_bytes by Country | geom geo_countries featureIdField=Country

table.search: index=network sourcetype=firewall OR sourcetype=proxy | lookup threat_intelligence dest_ip OUTPUT is_malicious, threat_type, threat_source | where is_malicious="true" | stats count by src_ip, dest_ip, threat_type, threat_source | sort -count

chart.search: index=network sourcetype=netflow OR sourcetype=firewall | stats sum(bytes) as total_bytes by dest_ip | sort -total_bytes | head 10 | eval total_MB=round(total_bytes/1024/1024,2) | fields dest_ip, total_MB

table.search: index=network sourcetype=netflow OR sourcetype=firewall | eval ratio=bytes_out/bytes_in | where ratio > 10 AND bytes_out > 1000000 | table _time src_ip dest_ip bytes_in bytes_out ratio app | sort -ratio

chart.search: index=network sourcetype=firewall OR sourcetype=proxy | eval hour=strftime(_time, "%H") | stats count by hour, user | eventstats avg(count) as avg_count, stdev(count) as stdev_count by user | eval threshold=avg_count+(stdev_count*2) | where count > threshold | sort -count
index=network sourcetype=firewall | stats dc(dest_port) as unique_ports by src_ip, dest_ip | where unique_ports > 10 | sort -unique_ports | head 10

table.search: index=network (sourcetype=firewall OR sourcetype=ids) | stats count(eval(action="blocked" OR action="denied")) as blocked_count by src_ip, dest_ip, dest_port | where blocked_count > 20 | eval service=case( dest_port=22, "SSH", dest_port=3389, "RDP", dest_port=445, "SMB", dest_port=1433, "SQL Server", dest_port=3306, "MySQL", 1=1, "Other") | sort -blocked_count

chart.search: index=network sourcetype=firewall | where dest_port IN (22, 3389, 445, 1433, 3306, 5432, 27017) | eval service=case( dest_port=22, "SSH", dest_port=3389, "RDP", dest_port=445, "SMB", dest_port=1433, "SQL Server", dest_port=3306, "MySQL", dest_port=5432, "PostgreSQL", dest_port=27017, "MongoDB") | stats count by service, src_ip | sort -count
index=network sourcetype=ids OR sourcetype=firewall action=blocked | timechart span=1h count | predict count future_timespan=0 algorithm=LLP | where count > (upper95(prediction) * 1.2)
